front.title: SPF/FROM-HDR Determining sender policy for the From: header

abstract.t: This document is part of the Unified SPF series. It defines the SPF/FROM-HDR test, which uses the spf_test() function in conjunction with the From: header of the email. This document describes the mechanics, semantics and utility of the SPF/FROM-HDR test. It also recommends receiver policy actions.
